name: Software Engineer
description: Responsible for designing, coding, testing, and debugging software applications.

name: Marketing Manager
description: Responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies to promote products or services.

name: Nurse Practitioner
description: Responsible for providing primary care to patients, diagnosing illnesses, and prescribing medications.

name: Data Scientist
description: Responsible for analyzing and interpreting complex data to drive insights and decision-making.
